original_text: I myself will accept only the food that my young men have eaten. But Aner, Eshcol and Mamre went with me to help me to fight. They should take their part of the things that we brought back with us.’
korean_text: 오직 젊은이들이 먹은 것과 나와 동행한 아넬과 에스골과 마므레의 분깃을 제할지니 그들이 그 분깃을 가질 것이니라

sentences.original_text: I myself will accept only the food
that my young men have eaten
But Aner, Eshcol and Mamre went with me
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 아넬, 에스골과 마므레가 나와 함께 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: of the things that we brought back with us
